author: beechinour
text:
i’ve tested 99% of AI image generation methods since i started making these videos...

99% of outputs are slop, but me and my team have discovered a few really good frameworks that let’s us create extremely tasteful and high quality images

We train our images off of the coloring/vibes of some of our favorite directors, without stealing from them of course

reply “IMAGE” + RT and i’ll send you the our full image prompting guide
(must be following so i can dm)
